017package org.apache.juneau.config.store;
018
019/**
020 * Listens for changes to stored config files.
021 */
022public interface ConfigStoreListener {
023
024   /**
025    * Called when the physical contents of a config file have changed.
026    *
027    * @param contents The new config contents;
028    */
029   void onChange(String contents);
030}
